message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $120. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $160 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
